subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Davis, a star this season who arrived for a series in the Bronx with 32 homers, has no regrets about turning down the Yankees after the 2004 amateur draft, he said.
snippet: Chris Davis, a star this season who arrived for a series in the Bronx with 32 homers, has no regrets about turning down the Yankees after the 2004 amateur draft, he said.
